short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Browser Permissions Chrome extension is designed to help users manage and control the permissions granted

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser Permissions is a powerful tool that allows users to easily view and manage the permissions granted to websites and other Chrome extensions. This extension provides a user-friendly interface to ensure that your browsing experience remains secure and private.

Key Features:

View Permissions: Quickly see which permissions have been granted to each website and extension.
Manage Permissions: Enable or disable permissions as needed to enhance your privacy and security.
Detailed Information: Get detailed descriptions of what each permission entails and how it affects your browsing experience.
User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive design makes it easy for users of all levels to navigate and control their permissions.
Benefits:

Enhanced Security: By managing permissions, you can reduce the risk of data breaches and unauthorized access.
Improved Privacy: Control which sites and extensions can access your data, ensuring your personal information remains private.
Customizable Experience: Tailor your browsing experience by granting permissions only to trusted sites and extensions.
